input.sentences: i went on a plane trip the other day to see a different city .
the food there was really terrible as you can see .
we had to go through this to get to a better place to eat .
we found this place right outside the airport | and it had pretty good food .
we saw tons of art from famous artists before we headed back home .
output.sentences: Here we are, packed into the coach section like cattle.
Luckily, the food totally sucks on planes as well.
After deplaning, it still feels like a prison.
Finally - some real food and drinks!
All that miserable travel was worth it to have arrived in here at this sculpture.
